section.title: Introduction
section.para: In Maven existing four different possibilities to release an artifact.

section.title: Install Artifact
section.para: Installing an artifact means to deploy an artifact into the users Maven repository (~/.m2/repository). This makes it possible to use this artifact as a dependency for an other project under this user.

section.title: Deploying Artifact
section.para: Deploying artifacts is needed if someone else would like to use the deployed artifact.Usually you will deploy only SNAPSHOT releases.

section.title: Release Preparation
section.para: The release preparation contains checking if no modifications have left over in your project. The tag for the release will be made..describe more in detail with example.

section.title: Perform the Release
section.para: The perform contains installation of artifacts whereas the deploy now deploys released artifact which means to have no -SNAPSHOT anymore (site, javadoc, sources.jar, signing of artifacts)
